SELECT DISTINCT t.[WORK_DATE] as workDate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT t.[ROUTE_ID] , t.[WORK_DATE] FROM [PBK_VIS].[ASKP_TICKET_CHECKS_BY_HOUR] t WHERE (#{filter.dateFrom, jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR #{filter.dateFrom, jdbcType=DATE} <= t.WORK_DATE) AND (#{filter.dateTo, jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR #{filter.dateTo, jdbcType=DATE} >= t.WORK_DATE) AND t.[ROUTE_ID] in (${filter.routes}) ) t JOIN [PBK_NSI].[WORK_DAYS] wd on wd.WORK_DATE = t.WORK_DATE WHERE 1 = 1
AND (#{filter.isWorkDate} = 1 AND wd.WORK_DAY_TYPE_ID = 1) or (#{filter.isWorkDate} = 0 AND wd.WORK_DAY_TYPE_ID in (2, 3))

SELECT routeNumber , workDate , hour , checks FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE rtk.[COD] WHEN '1' THEN 'А-' WHEN '2' THEN 'Тб-' WHEN '3' THEN 'Тр-' WHEN '4' THEN 'СТр-' END + rh.ROUTE_NUMBER as routeNumber , t.[WORK_DATE] as workDate , t.[HOUR] as hour , t.[CHECKS] as checks FROM ( SELECT t.[ROUTE_ID] , t.[WORK_DATE] , t.[HOUR] , sum(t.[ASKP_CHECKS_COUNT]) as CHECKS FROM [PBK_VIS].[ASKP_TICKET_CHECKS_BY_HOUR] t WHERE (#{filter.dateFrom, jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR #{filter.dateFrom, jdbcType=DATE} <= t.WORK_DATE) AND (#{filter.dateTo, jdbcType=DATE} IS NULL OR #{filter.dateTo, jdbcType=DATE} >= t.WORK_DATE) AND t.[ROUTE_ID] in (${filter.routes}) GROUP BY [ROUTE_ID], [WORK_DATE], [HOUR]) t JOIN PBK_NSI.ROUTE_HISTS rh ON (t.[ROUTE_ID] = rh.[HEAD_ID] AND rh.V_END_DATE >= PBK_CORE.getVersionEndDate()) LEFT JOIN PBK_NSI.ROUTE_TS_KINDS rtk on (rh.[ROUTE_TS_KIND_ID] = rtk.ID) ) t WHERE ${filter.where} ORDER BY routeNumber, workDate, hour
